tool_description: Validates app content, features, and business model against current platform policies to prevent policy violations.

content_description.description: Detailed description of app content and functionality

monetization_model.description: App monetization approach: free, paid, freemium, subscription, or ad-supported

error_messages: Invalid monetization model: Must be one of: free, paid, freemium, subscription, or ad-supported.
Content description required: Detailed content description cannot be empty.
Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' platforms are supported.
usage: Provide content_description, monetization_model, and target_platforms. Tool analyzes against current platform policies and identifies potential violations.

policy_compliance.description: Overall policy compliance status: compliant, warning, or violation
